<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Parent-&gt;extendInsnRange(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// closeInsnRange - Create a range based on FirstInsn and LastInsn collected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// until now. This is used when a new scope is encountered while walking</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// machine instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lexicalscope/#ae66f8be9ebdd37ca2829b3895f363213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lexicalscope/#ae66f8be9ebdd37ca2829b3895f363213">closeInsnRange</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lexicalscope/#a5056165859b8d49ebccf7d759764925a">LexicalScope</a> &#42;NewScope = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LastInsn &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Last insn missing!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ranges.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a50e4c9f81d1b75e9f5706df4cdb3c489">InsnRange</a>(FirstInsn, LastInsn));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FirstInsn = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Parent dominates NewScope then do not close Parent&#39;s instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Parent &amp;&amp; (!NewScope || !Parent-&gt;dominates(NewScope)))</span></CodeLine>
